content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the formation of complex carbohydrates?

choices.label: Monosaccharides are converted to simple sugars.
Monomers of polysaccharides are linked together through peptide bonds.
Nitrogen-containing bases are used to build complex carbohydrates.
Monosaccharides are joined together through covalent bonds.

content.answer: Monosaccharides are joined together through covalent bonds.
